ygData.subject: RE: Plane of Hate, was: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: According to EQVault, a group of adventurers actually entered the Plane of Hate.  They of course, didn t say where the portal was located (I still think that
ygData.messageBody:
According to EQVault, a group of adventurers actually entered the
Plane of Hate. They of course, didn't say where the portal was
located (I still think that the Oasis rumor makes no sense...PoF
entrance is near Cazic's temple, why would Innoruk's plane be in the
middle of the desert? I still stand on my Nektulos forest or Kithicor
(only because the culmination of last night's event seemed to take
place in Kithicor))...if the Vault story is untrue, or only on the
test server, we'll probably see the PoH open up in the next patch. I
did, however, notice that the PoH zone file was updated in the last
patch. Total speculation...

Robynn Merrilin, chasing 25th on E'ci

--
Katy Westerman Don't lick something unless
katyw@... you really mean it.
http://www.cs.ucr.edu/~katyw -Advice from the Naked
CS/Comp Math Major, UC Riverside Dancing Llama
